name: Harhar
tagline: Humble Avalanche Replayer of HTTP Archives
body: This tool allows you to generate a HTTP Archive (.har) file using your browser, and replay the content at high volumes using [Spirent Avalanche](http://www.spirent.com/go/avalanche). The program has been tested and works on Windows and Linux (through Mono).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
